REPORTINGGROUP.GROUPDESCRIPTION: Users who have access to Ad Hoc Reporting
Users who have access to Ad Hoc Reporting and Report Studio
Users who can administer authorization rights. They administer groups, accounts, contacts, distribution lists, data sources, and printers

SIGNATUREGROUP.CRFTEXT:
By my dated signature below, I %s %s, verify that all case report form pages accurately display the results of the examinations, tests, evaluations and treatments performed on this patient.

Pursuant to Section 11.100 of Title 21 of the Code of Federal Regulations, this is to certify that I intend that this electronic signature is to be the legally binding equivalent of my handwritten signature.

To this I do attest by supplying my user name and password and clicking the button marked Submit below

REPORTINGGROUP.GROUPDESCRIPTION: Users who can create folders and other content within the Public Folder space
Users who can administer authorized public content such as setting permissions on folders and reports
Users who have access to user data including password related data
Users who have access to user data except password related data
